name: GunApp HD
description:
Turn your iPad into a toy gun! Realistically modeled animations put you in control of the ultimate 3D gun simulator.

Have fun with your friends in a mock fire-fight, play Russian Roulette to settle disputes, use a banana the way you have always wanted to - as a FEARSOME WEAPON of LETHALITY, or turn your iPad into a chainsaw that can cut absolutely ANYTHING in HALF!! (virtually, of course)

ALL IN FULL 3D!!

With GunApp3D you can:
★ Choose from 10+ backgrounds to suit your taste
★ Take screenshots of your favorite combinations to set as your iPad's wallpaper
★ Realistically interact with a 9mm pistol (reload, fire, and manual slide control)
★ Encrust your gold plated 9mm ghetto blaster with your initials (in diamonds)
★ Play Russian Roulette with a .357 revolver
★ Snipe your pals (or boss) using a removable silencer
★ Use a banana as a semi-automatic weapon
★ Turn your iPad into a chainsaw

A lot went into this app to make it as interesting as possible to gun enthusiasts. Suggestions/Feedback are always welcome. Send e-mails to felix@mobiledevgroup.com
